description:
Non Tech

  • Help with Product RoadMap & features – defining, prioritization & maintaining for 3 tracks
    • Dev Assistant
    • Infra Use Cases
    • Data Use Cases
  • Drive Adoption across teams
  • Create Demo videos for new features and solutions
  • Gather requirements for new ideas, features
  • Track Product issues / defects
  • Host Open Office Hours and help with adoption
  • Help with taking demo’s and trainings ( such as show & tell , prompt engineering sessions etc )
  • Help with Onboarding new user teams
  • Keep Track of Onboarding status of all teams
  • Help/Resolve cross team dependencies such as governance, approvals, platform & upstream/downstream teams
Tech

  • Research new frameworks, propose and test new concepts. Lead & do Proof-Of-Concept Development of new features
  • Create Platform Adoption/Usage Dashboards using BigQuery and Tableau etc
  • Able to write/test Python, Java code/ Unit Tests
  • Familiarity with Testing frameworks ( doesn’t need to be expert )
  • Good knowledge of Prompt Engineering, Vector DB’s. Should be able to query Vector DB’s
